name: BHARTIYA GRAMOTTHAN SANSTHA

address: Gramotthan Bhawan, Upper Road, Dhalwala, Rishikesh, Dist- Tehri Garhwal, Uttrakhand

briefDescription: The organisation is working in the field of income generation activities and women empowerment programmes by providing handicraft based trainings to the beneficiaries.  The handicraft work includes handicraft made of natural fibers like wool, jute and local fibre available in Uttrakhand. The items manufactured by the beneficiaries include jute bags, jute file folders, jute mats, jute slippers, jute souvenirs jute braided work items, woolen shawls, pankhis, lohi, stoles, pullovers etc. Near about 2500 beneficiaries are being served by the organisations.
